about_the_game:
Synopsis:

The world is filled with curses that can corrode the World Tree and at the same time nurture it and all living things. There are ten major races living in the world created by the gods. The protagonist, Carrol, lives in the distant and luminous forest, away from the mundane world. She has just inherited the title of Duke from her deceased father and is preparing to inspect her territory when she meets a elf girl who has descended from the sky... As a vampire who has lived to the present, with a strong self-esteem and memories in her heart, what kind of things will Carrol encounter in the future...

Game features:

The Curse Accumulation System and the Binding of the Lamb God will affect the difficulty of some battles and the direction of the plot. The personality-rich side-scrolling battle module and skill performances add to the experience, and there are six difficulty levels to accommodate different players' needs. There are over 15 playable characters, each with their own unique skill animations. The game also features rich maps and a compelling storyline, with both normal and hidden endings.

Game time：

8hours and more

Role introduction:


Carrol, a vampire girl, inherited the title of the former lord.


Leimi, an elf girl who descended from the sky.


Belia, a former monster hunter who appears in various places.


Kris, a girl who calls herself a novice adventurer.


Bamanta, a warrior of the red dragon clan.


Ashes，？？？

Welcome to visit my promotional website,the patches required for this operation can be downloaded from this website..
We are looking for the cooperation of game publishers or translators, if there is a transaction request, please contact my email.

name: 淤積的祈禱（Silted Prayer）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel E5300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 7350K or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX590 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A hundred years ago, the chaotic world was suddenly pacified by the sword saint Nedidora, gradually moving towards peace. However, the crisis of the curse of all things was also uncovered... On the dark world tree, what kind of things will Karulu, as a lord, encounter...
